name: Daemon Summoner
synopsis: With his infant son brutally murdered, and wife Emily reborn as a Vampire, James Farrington-Higgs has himself become a creature of the darkness. Now he must strike back against the evil forces, desperately prowling the streets of London in search of his vampire bride. His journey will uncover a horrific conspiracy as he battles to save his wife and prevent the completion of a demonic ritual held deep within the catacombs of an ancient monastery.
